elements.textContent:
Different cultures assign varying luckiness or unluckiness to specific numbers.
Number 4 is unlucky in Chinese culture due to its similar sound to the word for "death".
Number 7 is considered lucky in many Western cultures, potentially due to its frequent occurrence in religion and mythology.
Number 8 is lucky in Chinese culture because it sounds similar to the word for "wealth" or "prosperity".
Number 13 is considered unlucky in many Western cultures, potentially due to its association with the Last Supper.
